mapper.select: SELECT no,rname,openhour,rphoto,price,rescheck,grade,num FROM (SELECT no,rname,openhour,rphoto,price,rescheck,grade,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,rname,openhour,rphoto,price,rescheck,grade FROM restaurant ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM restauranttag ORDER BY tagcode
SELECT x.tagcode,y.no,y.rname,y.openhour,y.rphoto,y.price,y.rescheck,y.grade,y.rescheck FROM resttagmapper x JOIN restaurant y ON x.rno=y.no WHERE x.tagcode=#{foodtagcode} ORDER BY y.no;
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/4.0) FROM (SELECT x.tagcode,y.no,y.rname,y.openhour,y.rphoto,y.price,y.rescheck,y.grade FROM resttagmapper x JOIN restaurant y ON x.rno=y.no WHERE x.tagcode=#{foodtagcode});
